author: CTPPS
body:
This PR introduces the DQM for Totem vertical timing detectors, using `TotemTimingDigi`.
As discussed on last Friday's [reco & analysis tools meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/718747/contributions/2954139/attachments/1628529/2594591/totempr-cmsoffmg.pdf), this shall be applied on top of #22796 (currently in an advanced review stage, waiting for a couple of signatures), hence should only contain https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/commit/a3969f46cd87d93100db40608693f878a8e60423 and https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/commit/24bb748f81be946e4bbef494cd511d82094ea5da, as shown in https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/compare/totem_timing_digiProducer_PR...CTPPS:totem_timing_DQM_PR. No conflicts are expected once #22796 is merged.

To be included in DQM at P5 during the alignment run (occuring this Saturday morning) to commission the detectors.
title: Totem timing DQM
